00227  inline void setChannelPositions(QValueList<int>& positions){
00228    delete []channelPositions;
00229    //nbchannels = positions.size(), this has been check in the calling functions.
00230    channelPositions = new int[nbchannels];
00231    for(int i = 0; i < nbchannels; ++i)
00232      channelPositions[i] = positions[i]; 
00233 
00234    //Everything has to be redraw
00235    drawContentsMode = REDRAW;
00236  };
